Hi! My name is Hymie Israel and I am a MS student in the Business Analytics program with a focus on Data Analytics at Baruch College with an expected graduation date of Fall 2026.


```{r}

if(!require("leaflet")){
    options(repos=c(CRAN="https://cloud.r-project.org"))
    install.packages("leaflet")
    stopifnot(require("leaflet"))
}

baruch_longitude <- -73.9832
baruch_latitude  <- +40.7404

leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, zoom=17) |>
  addPopups(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, 
            "I am a Master's student at <b>Baruch College</b>!") 
```
